dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A fire in Almaty last night spread across over 500 square meters, destroying multiple buildings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A fire in Almaty last night spread across over five hundred square meters, destroying multiple buildings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A fire broke out on the night of June 11 in a barracks-type residential house in Almaty. The total area affected is preliminarily over 500 square meters, the press release stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it uh, started in a barracks-type house on Mezhdunarodnaya Street, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it uh, started in a barracks-type house on Mezhdunarodnaya Street, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was reported that the fire occurred on Mezhdunarodnaya Street in the Turksib district. A fire occurred in a barracks-type residential building with multiple owners, spreading to a neighboring house with four owners of a similar structure, as well as to a bathhouse and utility building.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and it spread to a neighboring building, a bathhouse, even a utility structure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and it spread to a neighboring building, a bathhouse, even a utility structure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A fire occurred in a barracks-type residential building with multiple owners, spreading to a neighboring house with four owners of a similar structure, as well as to a bathhouse and utility building.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Tragically, rescuers found the body of a man at the scene.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tragically, rescuers found the body of a man at the scene.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the scene, firefighters discovered the body of a man, the agency confirmed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And I heard there was a gas cylinder explosion during the firefighting efforts too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I heard there was a gas cylinder explosion during the firefighting efforts too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was noted that a gas cylinder exploded during the firefighting operation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's what made it so dangerous—the dense layout meant flames just jumped from building to building.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what made it so dangerous-the dense layout meant flames just jumped from building to building.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan's Ministry of Emergency Situations added that due to the dense layout of the buildings, the fire quickly spread to adjacent structures.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Department of Emergency Situations had to operate under an elevated response level for this one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Department of Emergency Situations had to operate under an elevated response level for this one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Firefighters deployed a command center and operated under an elevated response level.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They set up a command center and eventually localized the fire, but it took all night to fully extinguish.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They set up a command center and eventually localized the fire, but it took all night to fully extinguish.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Firefighters deployed a command center and operated under an elevated response level. The fire was fully extinguished during the night over an area of 586 square meters, the agency added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Over 586 square meters in the end—that's a huge area for a residential fire.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Over five hundred eighty six square meters in the end-that's a huge area for a residential fire.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The fire was fully extinguished during the night over an area of 586 square meters, the agency added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're still searching for potential victims, which is just heartbreaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're still searching for potential victims, which is just heartbreaking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The press service also noted that searches for potential victims are ongoing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's not the first major fire in Kazakhstan recently either—Astana had a big evacuation not long ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not the first major fire in Kazakhstan recently either-Astana had a big evacuation not long ago.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, a major fire erupted in a residential complex in Astana, prompting residents to evacuate on their own.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder about safety regulations in these older, densely packed neighborhoods.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder about safety regulations in these older, densely packed neighborhoods.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Barracks-style housing with multiple owners… that's a real challenge for fire prevention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Barracks-style housing with multiple owners... that's a real challenge for fire prevention.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Hopefully this leads to some serious reviews of urban planning and emergency protocols.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hopefully this leads to some serious reviews of urban planning and emergency protocols.
